Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
03.04.2012 SH SCR17149 Removed '_D' from public name
16.11.2011 SH SCR16836 UTF-8 version for SCF Russia and changed File2Blb to File2BlbKeepBOM
where SFCO is stored
22.12.2010 SH Removed unused test stuff
03.12.2010 SH SCR16938 Added logic to skip file if does not contain detailed
29.11.2010 SH SCR16025 Extended update <scf:emailAddress>
-- Pre-defined element groups
-- Initializations
... without trailing '/', the index 1-999 has to be added
-- If XML file only contains only one message (<notification> element) and all
fields within this element are blank the file has to be ignored, already stored
SCFH/SECA rows have to be deleted, XML file is already moved to \Handled folder
-- In case of no errors and the incoming XML file is converted,
submit BSF408 to futher handle the file
@ Task use direct access to XML file
... at least one <scf:notification> group must exists in the file, else ERROR
... set SCFH_STATUS = 13 (Errors detected)
... set variables from XML file
-- In case of no detail information no SCFH/SECA has to be stored, already
stored SCFH/SECA row is deleted in parent task
... further updates
